prompts: Create a unique psychic-type Pokemon with a glyph-like shape and a mysterious aura.
Imagine a Pokemon that resembles letters and has an elegant, minimalist design.
Generate a creature inspired by ancient symbols that embodies knowledge and hidden secrets.
Show me a psychic Pokemon with a sleek, unusual body and a monochromatic color scheme.
Design a Pokemon that represents a letter of the alphabet, focusing on elegance and simplicity.
Give me a Pokemon that looks like a mystical character from a forgotten language.
Make a Pokemon that combines the aesthetics of alphabets with a captivating psychic power.
